metadata.title: CVE-2021-23369 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
The package handlebars before 4.7.7 are vulnerable to Remote Code Execution(RCE) when selecting certain compiling options to compile templates comingfrom an untrusted source.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-23369` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

handlebars - 3:4.7.7+~4.1.0-1
libjs-handlebars - 3:4.7.7+~4.1.0-1
libjs-handlebars.runtime - 3:4.7.7+~4.1.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-handlebars package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3:4.7.7+~4.1.0-1').
